name: QuickAction

methods.name: describeAvailableQuickActions
methods.description: Returns metadata information for the available quick actions of the provided parent object.

methods.name: describeAvailableQuickActions
methods.description: Returns the metadata information for the provided quick actions.

methods.name: performQuickAction
methods.description: Performs the quick action specified in the quick action request and returns the action result.

methods.name: performQuickAction
methods.signature: public static QuickAction.QuickActionResult performQuickAction(QuickAction.QuickActionRequest quickActionRequest, Boolean allOrNothing)
methods.description: Performs the quick action specified in the quick action request with the option for partial success, and returns the result.

methods.name: performQuickActions
methods.description: Performs the quick actions specified in the quick action request list and returns action results.

methods.name: performQuickActions
methods.signature: public static List<QuickAction.QuickActionResult> performQuickActions(List<QuickAction.QuickActionRequest> quickActionRequests, Boolean allOrNothing)
methods.description: Performs the quick actions specified in the quick action request list with the option for partial success, and returns action results.

description: Use Apex to request and process actions on objects
